abstract: meghan markle is the most googled actor of 2017 .
article: meghan markle has gone from the cast of suits to a future member of the royal family , thanks to her engagement to prince harry . her incredible year has led her to the top of an annual year-end list : the most googled actors of 2017 . google just released its annual ranking of the top-searched stars of the year , and markle hit the top of the list , no doubt because many people wanted to know more about her before the big royal wedding in may . the rest of the list may not be marrying royals , but they were big names in the news this year .

gal gadot played wonder woman in one of the most successful movies of the year , and millie bobby brown returned as eleven in stranger things , netflix 's massive hit show . bill skarsgård freaked everyone out as pennywise in it , while tom holland entertained them as spider-man . tommy wiseau did n't star in a big movie this year , but james franco played him in the disaster artist , a movie that retells the making of the so-bad-it 's - hilarious movie the room . and meryl streep went viral for her golden globes speech that was a powerful statement against president trump .

unfortunately , not all of the actors made the list for positive reasons . two of the top-searched actors , kevin spacey and louis c. k. , likely made the list because of allegations of sexual harassment or assault . and maia campbell made the news over the summer after a video surfaced that appeared to show the in the house star , who has had issues with mental health in the past , asking for drugs . ll cool j , who starred with her on the show , went on social media to call out the person who filmed the video instead of helping her , and put out a call for her contact information so he could reach out .

here 's the top 10 list of most-searched actors : meghan marklekevin spaceygal gadotlouis c. kmeryl streepbill skarsgårdmillie bobby browntom hollandmaia campbelltommy wiseau . why meghan markle will make a great princess .
